metadataAttributes.Title: Channel Management and Retailing
metadataAttributes.Short Intro: Understand how channel management and retailing can improve performance in your business.  Nowadays, a distribution strategy is part of the DNA of many companies and a correct channel management is key for the success of your product. Distribution plans need to be prepared for the long run, combining the following main areas:  company profile, portfolio structure and price positioning, go-to-market policy, trade and retail marketing, e-commerce and global retail management.
